name: mupirocin

indications.text: mupirocin ointment usp , 2 % indicated topical treatment impetigo due : . s. aureus s. pyogenes

contraindications.text: small amount mupirocin ointment usp , 2 % applied affected area 3 times daily . area treated may covered gauze dressing desired . patients showing response within 3 5 days re-evaluated .

adverseReactions: contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity constituents product .
indications_original:
Mupirocin Ointment USP, 2% is indicated for the topical treatment of impetigo due to: and .
 
  S. aureus
                     S. pyogenes
contraindications_original: A small amount of Mupirocin Ointment USP, 2% should be applied to the affected area 3 times daily. The area treated may be covered with a gauze dressing if desired. Patients not showing a clinical response within 3 to 5 days should be re-evaluated.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: NDC:17856-0112-1 in a SYRINGE of 1 OINTMENTS
adverseReactions_original: This drug is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any of the constituents of the product.
